directions.step: Funny you should ask about juicing. I just got my juicer out last week and decided to use it. I went to the library and checked out a book named "Juicing for Life" by Cherie Calbom and Maureen Keane. It is a guide to the health benefits of fresh fruits and vegetable juicing. It has alot of recipes for juice combinations. I have been using it for about a week. I think I'm going to like it. Here are a couple of recipes to get you started but you should go check it out. Posted to recipelu-digest Volume 01 Number 490 by mike@comnett.net on Jan 10, 1998
